column4: if you have an old version off ubuntu(like 6.06) can you get some applications from 7.10 repositories with apt? it would be nice if you can add the 7.10 repositories somewere and use apt-get install program -use_the_newer_repositories and you can get install that program and it's dependencies
that is asking for ultimate breakage ;]
thus the idea for a seperate /home ;]
